analysis.description:
RootsSale.mintTokenToBuyer (/unique_chucks/21/0xf75e3e8d275146157b8e0e540542adceeccbb349.sol#543-556) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0xf75e3e8d275146157b8e0e540542adceeccbb349.sol#553-554)

RootsSale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/21/0xf75e3e8d275146157b8e0e540542adceeccbb349.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/21/0xf75e3e8d275146157b8e0e540542adceeccbb349.sol)
